verses.text: Thus \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w were|strong="H8064"\w* \w completed|strong="H3615"\w* \w in|strong="H6635"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w vast|strong="H6635"\w* \w array|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* God \w had|strong="H4399"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H4399"\w* \w been|strong="H3615"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w*; \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w rested|strong="H7673"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.\f + \fr 2:2 \ft Cited in Hebrews 4:4\f*

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* God \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w rested|strong="H7673"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w creation|strong="H1254"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w accomplished|strong="H6213"\w*. Man and Woman in the Garden

\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w account|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \f + \fr 2:4 \ft LORD or GOD, with capital letters, represents the proper name of the God of Israel and the one true God, transliterated from the Hebrew as YHWH; here and throughout the Scriptures.\f* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w shrub|strong="H7880"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w appeared|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w plant|strong="H6212"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w sprouted|strong="H6779"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w sent|strong="H3068"\w* \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w cultivate|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ground|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* springs \f + \fr 2:6 \ft Or mist\f* welled \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w watered|strong="H8248"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w surface|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ground|strong="H6083"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w breathed|strong="H5397"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w breath|strong="H5397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* nostrils, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w*.\f + \fr 2:7 \ft Or a living soul; cited in 1 Corinthians 15:45\f*

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w placed|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w*.

\w Out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ground \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* gave growth \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w pleasing|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* eye \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* \w were|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w flowed|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w* branched \w into|strong="H3318"\w* four headwaters:
The name of the first river is Pishon; it winds through the whole land of Havilah, where there is gold.
And the gold of that land is pure, and bdellium and onyx are found there.
The name of the second river is Gihon; it winds through the whole land of Cush.
The name of the third river is Hiddekel; it runs along the east side of Assyria. And the fourth river is the Euphrates.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H5647"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w placed|strong="H3240"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Garden|strong="H1588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w cultivate|strong="H5647"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* eat freely \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* eat \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w alone|strong="H6213"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w suitable|strong="H5048"\w* \w helper|strong="H5828"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ground|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w bird|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w air|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w creature|strong="H5315"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* livestock, \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w air|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* Adam \f + \fr 2:20 \ft Or the man, as in verses 19 and 21\f* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w suitable|strong="H5048"\w* \w helper|strong="H5828"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w caused|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w slept|strong="H3462"\w*, \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H5307"\w*’s \w ribs|strong="H6763"\w* \f + \fr 2:21 \ft Or took part of the man’s side; similarly in verse 22\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w closed|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* area \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w rib|strong="H6763"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* man, \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1320"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*: “\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* \w now|strong="H6471"\w* \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* \w of|strong="H6106"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H6106"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w be|strong="H1320"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* ‘woman,’ \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H6106"\w* \w man|strong="H1320"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1320"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*.”

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w reason|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1320"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* father \w and|strong="H1320"\w* mother \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* united \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.\f + \fr 2:24 \ft LXX and the two will become one flesh; cited in Matthew 19:5, Mark 10:7–8, 1 Corinthians 6:16, and Ephesians 5:31\f*

\w And|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* man \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* wife \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w*, \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* ashamed.
